   38: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   39:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,

   41: 	 get_columns_and_rows/1, exit_initial/1, job_control_local/1,
   42: 	 job_control_remote/1,stop_during_init/1,wrap/1,
   43:          shell_history/1, shell_history_resize/1, shell_history_eaccess/1,
   44:          shell_history_repair/1, shell_history_repair_corrupt/1,
   45:          shell_history_corrupt/1,
   46:          shell_history_custom/1, shell_history_custom_errors/1,
   47: 	 job_control_remote_noshell/1,ctrl_keys/1,

   69: -export([test_invalid_keymap/1, test_valid_keymap/1]).
   70: %% Exports for custom shell history module
   71: -export([load/0, add/1]).
   72: %% For custom prompt testing
   73: -export([prompt/1]).
   74: -record(tmux, {peer, node, name, orig_location }).
   75: suite() ->
   76:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   77:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].
   78: 
   79: all() ->
   80:     [{group, to_erl},
   81:      {group, tty}].
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     [{to_erl,[],
   85:       [get_columns_and_rows_escript,get_columns_and_rows,
   86:        exit_initial, job_control_local,
   87:        job_control_remote, job_control_remote_noshell,
   88:        ctrl_keys, stop_during_init, wrap,
   89:        shell_invalid_ansi,
   90:        shell_get_password,
   91:        {group, shell_history},
   92:        {group, remsh}]},
   93:      {shell_history, [],
   94:       [shell_history,
   95:        shell_history_resize,
   96:        shell_history_eaccess,
   97:        shell_history_repair,
   98:        shell_history_repair_corrupt,
   99:        shell_history_corrupt,
  100:        {group, sh_custom}
  101:       ]},
  102:      {sh_custom, [],
  103:       [shell_history_custom,
  104:        shell_history_custom_errors]},
  105:      {remsh, [],
  106:       [remsh_basic,
  107:        remsh_error,
  108:        remsh_longnames,
  109:        remsh_no_epmd,
  110:        remsh_expand_compatibility_25,
  111:        remsh_expand_compatibility_later_version]},
  112:      {tty,[],
  113:       [{group,tty_unicode},
  114:        {group,tty_latin1},
  115:        test_invalid_keymap, test_valid_keymap,
  116:        shell_suspend,
  117:        shell_full_queue,
  118:        external_editor,
  119:        external_editor_visual,

  124:        shell_invalid_unicode,

  127:        %% shell_unicode_wrap,

  131:       ]},
  132:      {tty_latin1,[],[{group,tty_tests}]},
  133:      {tty_tests, [parallel],
  134:       [shell_navigation, shell_multiline_navigation, shell_multiline_prompt,
  135:        shell_xnfix, shell_delete, shell_format, shell_help,

  145: 
  146: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  147:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
  148:     os:putenv("TERM", "vt100"),
  149:     [{term,Term}|Config].
  150: 
  151: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  152:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  153:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  154:     ok.
  155: 
  156: init_per_group(to_erl, Config) ->
  157:     case rtnode:get_progs() of
  158:         {error, Error} ->
  159:             {skip, Error};
  160:         _ ->
  161:             DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
  162:             [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config]
  163:     end;
  164: init_per_group(remsh, Config) ->
  165:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  166:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  167:         new -> Config
  168:     end;
  169: init_per_group(shell_history, Config) ->
  170:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  171:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  172:         new -> Config
  173:     end;
  174: init_per_group(tty, Config) ->
  175:     case string:split(tmux("-V")," ") of
  176:         ["tmux",[Num,$.|_]] when Num >= $3, Num =< $9 ->
  177:             tmux("kill-session"),
  178:             "" = tmux("-u new-session -x 50 -y 60 -d"),
  179:             ["" = tmux(["set-environment '",Name,"' '",Value,"'"])
  180:              || {Name,Value} <- os:env()],
  181:             Config;
  182:         ["tmux", Vsn] ->
  183:             {skip, "invalid tmux version " ++ Vsn ++ ". Need vsn 3 or later"};
  184:         Error ->
  185:             {skip, "tmux not installed " ++ Error}
  186:     end;
  187: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty_unicode;
  188:                                    Group =:= tty_latin1 ->
  189:     [Lang,_] =
  190:         string:split(
  191:           os:getenv("LC_ALL",
  192:                     os:getenv("LC_CTYPE",
  193:                               os:getenv("LANG","en_US.UTF-8"))),"."),
  194:     case Group of
  195:         tty_unicode ->
  196:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  197:         tty_latin1 ->
  198:             % [{encoding, latin1},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".ISO-8859-1"}]}|Config],
  199:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"}
  200:     end;
  201: init_per_group(sh_custom, Config) ->
  202:     %% Ensure that ERL_AFLAGS will not override the value of the shell_history variable.
  203:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-noshell","-kernel","shell_history","not_overridden"]),
  204:     try erpc:call(Node, application, get_env, [kernel, shell_history], rtnode:timeout(normal)) of
  205:         {ok, not_overridden} ->
  206:             Config;
  207:         _ ->
  208:             SkipText = "shell_history variable is overridden (probably by ERL_AFLAGS)",
  209:             {skip, SkipText}
  210:     catch
  211:         C:R:Stk ->
  212:             io:format("~p\n~p\n~p\n", [C,R,Stk]),
  213:             {skip, "Unexpected error"}
  214:     after
  215:         peer:stop(Peer)
  216:     end;
  217: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  218:     Config.
  219: 
  220: end_per_group(tty, _Config) ->
  221:     Windows = string:split(tmux("list-windows"), "\n", all),
  222:     lists:foreach(
  223:       fun(W) ->
  224:               case string:split(W, " ", all) of
  225:                   ["0:" | _] -> ok;
  226:                   [No, _Name | _] ->
  227:                       "" = os:cmd(["tmux select-window -t ", string:split(No,":")]),
  228:                       ct:log("~ts~n~ts",[W, os:cmd(lists:concat(["tmux capture-pane -p -e"]))])
  229:               end
  230:       end, Windows),
  231: %    "" = os:cmd("tmux kill-session")
  232:     ok;
  233: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  234:     Config.
  235: 
  236: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
  237:     Path = [Func,
  238:             [proplists:get_value(name,P) ||
  239:                 P <- [proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[])] ++
  240:                     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])]],
  241:     [{tc_path, lists:concat(lists:join("-",lists:flatten(Path)))} | Config].
  242: 
  243: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  244:     GroupProperties = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  245:     case (GroupProperties =/= false) andalso proplists:get_value(parallel, GroupProperties, false) of
  246:         true -> ok;
  247:         false ->
  248:             %% Terminate any connected nodes. They may disturb test cases that follow.
  249:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  250:                                   catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, [])
  251:                           end, nodes()),
  252:             ok
  253:     end.
  254: 
  255: %%-define(DEBUG,1).
  256: -ifdef(DEBUG).
  257: -define(dbg(Data),ct:pal("~p",[Data])).
  258: -else.
  259: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
  260: -endif.
  261: 
  262: string_to_term(Str) ->
  263:     {ok,Tokens,_EndLine} = erl_scan:string(Str ++ "."),
  264:     {ok,AbsForm} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  265:     {value,Value,_Bs} = erl_eval:exprs(AbsForm, erl_eval:new_bindings()),
  266:     Value.
  267: 
  268: run_unbuffer_escript(Rows, Columns, EScript, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut) ->
  269:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  270:     TmpFile = filename:join(DataDir, "tmp"),
  271:     ok = file:write_file(TmpFile, <<>>),
  272:     CommandModifier =
  273:         case {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} of
  274:             {false, false} -> "";
  275:             {true, false} -> io_lib:format(" < ~s", [TmpFile]);
  276:             {false, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile]);
  277:             {true, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s < ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile, TmpFile])
  278:         end,
  279:     Command = io_lib:format("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty rows ~p; stty columns ~p; escript ~s ~s\"",
  280:                             [Rows, Columns, EScript, CommandModifier]),
  281:     %% io:format("Command: ~s ~n", [Command]),
  282:     Out = os:cmd(Command),
  283:     %% io:format("Out: ~p ~n", [Out]),
  284:     string_to_term(Out).
  285: 
  286: get_columns_and_rows_escript(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  287:     ExpectUnbufferInstalled =
  288:         try
  289:             "79" = string:trim(os:cmd("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty columns 79 ; tput cols\"")),
  290:             true
  291:         catch
  292:             _:_ -> false
  293:         end,
  294:     case ExpectUnbufferInstalled of
  295:         false ->
  296:             {skip,
  297:              "The unbuffer tool (https://core.tcl-lang.org/expect/index) does not seem to be installed.~n"
  298:              "On Ubuntu/Debian: \"sudo apt-get install expect\""};
  299:         true ->
  300:             DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  301:             IoColumnsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_columns.erl"),
  302:             IoRowsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_rows.erl"),
  303:             [
  304:              begin
  305:                  {ok, 42} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut),
  306:                  {ok, 99} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut)
  307:              end
  308:              ||
  309:                 {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} <- [{false, false}, {true, false}, {false, true}]
  310:             ],
  311:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, true, true),
  312:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, true, true),
  313:             ok
  314:     end.
  315: 
  316: %% Test that the shell can access columns and rows.
  317: get_columns_and_rows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  318:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  319: 	old ->
  320:             test_columns_and_rows(old, []);
  321: 	new ->
  322:             test_columns_and_rows(old, ["-oldshell"]),
  323:             test_columns_and_rows(new, [])
  324:     end,
  325:     ok.
  326: 
  327: test_columns_and_rows(old, Args) ->
  328:     rtnode:run(
  329:       [{putline, ""},
  330:        {putline, "2."},
  331:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  332:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  333:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"},
  334:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  335:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"}
  336:       ], [], [], Args),
  337: 
  338:     rtnode:run(
  339:       [{putline, ""},
  340:        {putline, "2."},
  341:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  342:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  343:        {expect, "{ok,90}\r\n"},
  344:        {putline,"io:rows()."},
  345:        {expect, "{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  346:       [],
  347:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ",
  348:       Args);
  349: test_columns_and_rows(new, _Args) ->
  350:     rtnode:run(
  351:       [{putline, ""},
  352:        {expect, "1> $"},
  353:        {putline, "2."},
  354:        {expect, "\r\n2\r\n"},
  355:        {expect, "> $"},
  356:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  357:        {expect, "{ok,80}\r\n"},
  358:        {expect, "> $"},
  359:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  360:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,24}\r\n"}
  361:       ]),
  362: 
  363:     rtnode:run(
  364:       [{putline, ""},
  365:        {expect, "1> $"},
  366:        {putline, "2."},
  367:        {expect,  "\r\n2\r\n"},
  368:        {expect, "> $"},
  369:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  370:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,90}\r\n"},
  371:        {expect, "> $"},
  372:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  373:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  374:       [],
  375:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ").
  376: 
  377: shell_navigation(Config) ->
  378: 
  379:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  380: 
  381:     try
  382:         [begin
  383:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}"),
  384:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward
  385:              check_content(Term, "{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}$"),
  386:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  387:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  388:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  389:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  390:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  391:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  392:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  393:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  394:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  395:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',")}),
  396:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  397:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  398:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  399:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b'")}),
  400:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  401:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  402:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  403:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
  404:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  405:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  406:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  407:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  408:              send_tty(Term,"C-H"),
  409:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  410:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  411:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  412:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  413:          end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  414:         ok
  415:     after
  416:         stop_tty(Term)
  417:     end.
  418: shell_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  419:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  420: 
  421:     try
  422:         [begin
  423:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  424:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,"),
  425:              check_location(Term, {0,width("{aaa,")}),
  426:              send_tty(Term,"\n'b"++U++"b',"),
  427:              check_location(Term, {0, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  428:              send_tty(Term,"\nccc}"),
  429:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward (blink)
  430:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  431:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  432:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  433:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  434:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  435:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  436:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  437:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc")}),
  438:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  439:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  440:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  441:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  442:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  443:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  444:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  445:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  446:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  447:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 1}),
  448:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  449:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b'")}),
  450:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  451:              check_location(Term, {-2, width("{aaa,")}),
  452:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  453:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  454:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  455:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  456:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  457:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U)}),
  458:              send_tty(Term,"M-<"),
  459:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  460:              send_tty(Term,"M->"),
  461:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  462:              check_location(Term, {0,width("ccc")}),
  463:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  464:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  465:              check_location(Term, {0,0}),
  466:              send_tty(Term,"C-h"), % Backspace
  467:              check_location(Term, {-1,width("ccc}")}),
  468:              send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  469:              send_tty(Term, "End"),
  470:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  471:              send_tty(Term,"M-Enter"),
  472:              check_content(Term, ".. ,"),
  473:              check_location(Term, {-1,0}),
  474:              send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  475:              check_location(Term, {-3,0}),
  476:              send_tty(Term,"{'"++U++"',\n\n\nworks}.\n")
  477:             end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  478:         ok
  479:     after
  480:         stop_tty(Term)
  481:     end.
  482: 
  483: shell_format(Config) ->
  484:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","format_shell_func","{shell,erl_pp_format_func}"]}|Config]),
  485:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  486:     EmacsFormat = "\""++DataDir ++ "emacs-format-file\"\n",
  487:     try
  488:         send_tty(Term1,"fun(X) ->\n  X\nend.\n"),
  489:         send_tty(Term1,"Up"),
  490:         %% Note, erl_pp puts 7 spaces before X
  491:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..        X\\s*.. end."),
  492:         send_tty(Term1, "Down"),
  493:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term1)," -x ",200]),
  494:         timer:sleep(1000),
  495:         send_stdin(Term1, "shell:format_shell_func(\"emacs -batch \${file} -l \"\n"),
  496:         send_stdin(Term1, EmacsFormat),
  497:         send_stdin(Term1, "\" -f emacs-format-function\").\n"),
  498:         check_content(Term1, "{shell,erl_pp_format_func}"),
  499:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  500:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  501:         send_tty(Term1, "\n"),
  502:         timer:sleep(1000),
  503:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  504:         %% Note, emacs-format puts 8 spaces before X
  505:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..         X\\s*.. end."),
  506:         send_tty(Term1, "Down"),
  507:         check_content(Term1, ">$"),
  508:         send_stdin(Term1, "shell:format_shell_func({bad,format}).\n"),
  509:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  510:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  511:         send_tty(Term1, "\n"),
  512:         timer:sleep(1000),
  513:         check_content(Term1, "\\Q* Bad format function: {bad,format}\\E"),
  514:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  515:         %% No modifications should be made, when default format function is used
  516:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..         X\\s*.. end."),
  517:         ok
  518:     after
  519:         stop_tty(Term1)
  520:     end.
  521: 
  522: shell_multiline_prompt(Config) ->
  523:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","{shell,inverted_space_prompt}"]}|Config]),
  524:     Term2 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","\"...> \""]}|Config]),
  525:     Term3 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","edlin"]}|Config]),
  526:     Term4 = start_tty(Config),
  527:     try
  528:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  529:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  530:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  531:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  532:         ok
  533:     after
  534:         stop_tty(Term1)
  535:     end,
  536:     try
  537:         check_location(Term2, {0, 0}),
  538:         send_tty(Term2,"\na"),
  539:         check_location(Term2, {0, 1}),
  540:         check_content(Term2, "...> a"),
  541:         ok
  542:     after
  543:         stop_tty(Term2)
  544:     end,
  545:     try
  546:         send_tty(Term3,"\na"),
  547:         check_location(Term3, {0, 1}),
  548:         check_content(Term3, ".. a"),
  549:         ok
  550:     after
  551:         stop_tty(Term3)
  552:     end,
  553:     try
  554:         send_tty(Term4, "shell:multiline_prompt_func(\"-> \").\n"),
  555:         check_content(Term4, "default"),
  556:         send_tty(Term4, "a\nb"),
  557:         check_content(Term4, "-> b"),
  558:         ok
  559:     after
  560:         stop_tty(Term4)
  561:     end.
  562: 
  563: shell_clear(Config) ->
  564: 
  565:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  566:     {Rows, _Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  567: 
  568:     try
  569:         send_tty(Term,"foobar."),
  570:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  571:         check_content(Term, "foobar"),
  572:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  573:         send_tty(Term,"bazbat"),
  574:         check_location(Term, {0, 6}),
  575:         send_tty(Term,"C-L"),
  576:         check_location(Term, {-Rows+1, 6}),
  577:         check_content(Term, "bazbat")
  578:     after
  579:         stop_tty(Term)
  580:     end.
  581: 
  582: shell_xnfix(Config) ->
  583: 
  584:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  585: 
  586:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  587:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  588: 
  589:     As = lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1,"a"),
  590: 
  591:     try
  592:         [begin
  593:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  594:              send_tty(Term,As),
  595:              check_content(Term,[As,$$]),
  596:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - 1}),
  597:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  598:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  599:              send_tty(Term,"aaa"),
  600:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 3}),
  601:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,3 + width(U))],
  602:              send_tty(Term,U),
  603:              %% a{Cols-1}U\naaaaa
  604:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  605:                                  U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  606:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  607:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  608:              send_tty(Term,U),
  609:              %% a{Cols-1}U\nUaaaaa
  610:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  611:                                  U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  612:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  613:              %% send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  614:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  615:              %% a{Cols-2}U\nUaaaaa
  616:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  617:              %%                     U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  618:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  619:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  620:              %%                     U,U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  621:              %% send_tty(Term,"aa"),
  622:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  623:              %%                     U,"a\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  624:              %% check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  625:              send_tty(Term,"C-K"),
  626:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  627:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  628:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  629:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  630:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  631:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  632:              ok
  633:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  634:     after
  635:         stop_tty(Term)
  636:     end.
  637: 
  638: 
  639: %% Characters that are larger than 2 wide need special handling when they
  640: %% are at the end of the current line.
  641: shell_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  642: 
  643:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  644: 
  645:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  646:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  647: 
  648:     try
  649:         [begin
  650:              FirstLine = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U)*2 + 1,"a")],
  651:              OtherLineA = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"a")],
  652:              OtherLineB = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"b")],
  653:              OtherLineC = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"c")],
  654:              OtherLineD = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"d")],
  655:              send_tty(Term,FirstLine),
  656:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  657:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  658: 
  659:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineA),
  660:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  661:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  662: 
  663:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineB),
  664:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  665:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  666: 
  667:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineC),
  668:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  669:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  670: 
  671:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineD),
  672:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  673:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  674: 
  675:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  676:              check_location(Term, {-4, 0}), %% Broken
  677:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  678:              check_location(Term, {-4, width(U)}), %% Broken
  679: 
  680:              send_tty(Term,"DC"), %% Broken
  681:              check_content(Term, ["a.*",U,"$"]),
  682:              check_content(Term, ["^b.*",U,"c$"]),
  683:              check_content(Term, ["^c.*",U,"dd$"]),
  684: 
  685:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  686:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  687:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  688:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  689:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  690:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  691: 
  692:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  693:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  694:     after
  695:         stop_tty(Term)
  696:     end.
  697: 
  698: shell_delete(Config) ->
  699: 
  700:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  701: 
  702:     try
  703: 
  704:         [ begin
  705:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  706:               check_content(Term, "> a$"),
  707:               check_location(Term, {0, 1}),
  708:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  709:               check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  710:               check_content(Term, ">$"),
  711:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  712:               send_tty(Term,U),
  713:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a, U])}),
  714:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  715:               send_tty(Term,U),
  716:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U,$a,U])}),
  717:               check_content(Term, ["> a",U,$a,U,"$"]),
  718:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  719:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  720:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  721:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  722:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  723:               send_tty(Term,U),
  724:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U])}),
  725:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  726:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  727:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  728:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  729:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  730:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  731:               check_content(Term, ["> a$"]),
  732:               send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  733:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  734:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  735:               check_location(Term, {0, width([])})
  736:           end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  737:     after
  738:         stop_tty(Term)
  739:     end.
  740: 
  741: %% When deleting characters at the edge of the screen that are "large",
  742: %% we need to take special care.
  743: shell_delete_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  744: 
  745:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  746: 
  747:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  748:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  749: 
  750:     try
  751:         [begin
  752:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  753:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  754:              send_tty(Term,[U,U,"aaaaa"]),
  755:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,U,"aaaaa$"]),
  756:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,5+2)],
  757:              check_location(Term,{0,-Col}),
  758:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  759:              check_content(Term,"> a* \n"),
  760:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 1}),
  761:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  762:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  763:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 2}),
  764:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  765:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U," \n"]),
  766:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 3}),
  767:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  768:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"\n"]),
  769:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  770:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 4}),
  771:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  772:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"a\n"]),
  773:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  774:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 5}),
  775:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  776:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  777:     after
  778:         stop_tty(Term)
  779:     end.
  780: 
  781: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  782: %% to take extra care
  783: shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap(Config) ->
  784: 
  785:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  786: 
  787:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  788:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  789: 
  790:     try
  791:         [begin
  792:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  793:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  794:              send_tty(Term,["a",U,"aaaaa"]),
  795:              check_content(Term,["\na",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  796:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  797:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  798:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  799:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  800:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  801:              check_content(Term,["> a* \n"]),
  802:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  803:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  804:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  805:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  806:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  807:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"a\n"]),
  808:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  809:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  810:     after
  811:         stop_tty(Term)
  812:     end.
  813: 
  814: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  815: %% to take extra care
  816: shell_update_window_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  817: 
  818:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  819: 
  820:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  821:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  822: 
  823:     try
  824:         [begin
  825:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U) + 1,"a")),
  826:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  827:              send_tty(Term,[U,"aaaaa"]),
  828:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  829:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols+1]),
  830:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\naaaaa$"]),
  831:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols]),
  832:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  833:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  834:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  835:     after
  836:         stop_tty(Term)
  837:     end.
  838: 
  839: shell_transpose(Config) ->
  840: 
  841:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  842: 
  843:     Unicode = [[$a]] ++ hard_unicode(),
  844: 
  845:     try
  846:         [
  847:          begin
  848:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  849:              [send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U],
  850:              send_tty(Term,"b"),
  851:              [[send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U2] || U2 <- Unicode],
  852:              send_tty(Term,"cde"),
  853:              check_content(Term, ["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  854:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde"])}),
  855:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  856:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  857:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  858:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  859:              check_location(Term, {0, 1+width([U])}),
  860:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  861:              check_content(Term, ["ab",U,Unicode,"cde$"]),
  862:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  863:              check_content(Term, ["ab",hd(Unicode),U,tl(Unicode),"cde$"]),
  864:              [send_tty(Term,"C-T") || _ <- lists:seq(1,length(Unicode)-1)],
  865:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,U,"cde$"]),
  866:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  867:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de$"]),
  868:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U])}),
  869:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  870:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de"])}),
  871:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  872:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  873:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  874:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  875:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  876:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  877:          end || U <- Unicode],
  878:         ok
  879:     after
  880:         stop_tty(Term),
  881:         ok
  882:     end.
  883: 
  884: shell_search(C) ->
  885:     Term = start_tty(C),
  886: 
  887:     try
  888:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  889:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  890:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  891:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  892:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  893:         send_tty(Term,[16#1f600]),
  894:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  895:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  896:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  897:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  898:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  899:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  900:         send_tty(Term,"C-a"),
  901:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(C, "'a'.")}),
  902:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  903:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  904:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  905:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  906:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  907:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  908:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*a."),
  909:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  910:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  911:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  912:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a'."),
  913:         send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  914:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  915:         ok
  916:     after
  917:         stop_tty(Term),
  918:         ok
  919:     end.
  920: 
  921: shell_insert(Config) ->
  922:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  923: 
  924:     try
  925:         send_tty(Term,"abcdefghijklm"),
  926:         check_content(Term, "abcdefghijklm$"),
  927:         check_location(Term, {0, 13}),
  928:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  929:         send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  930:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  931:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  932:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  933:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  934:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijklm$"),
  935:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
  936:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  937:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  938:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  939:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijlm$"),
  940:         ok
  941:     after
  942:         stop_tty(Term)
  943:     end.
  944: 
  945: shell_update_window(Config) ->
  946:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  947: 
  948:     Text = lists:flatten(["abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm"]),
  949:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  950: 
  951:     try
  952:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  953:         check_content(Term,Text),
  954:         check_location(Term, {0, width(Text)}),
  955:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col+1]),
  956:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  957:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  958:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  959:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(Text)}),
  960:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col]),
  961:         %% When resizing, tmux does not xnfix the cursor, so it will remain
  962:         %% at the previous locations
  963:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(Text)}),
  964:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  965:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 1}),
  966: 
  967:         %% When we do backspace here, tmux seems to place the cursor in an
  968:         %% incorrect position except when a terminal is attached.
  969:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  970:         %% This really should be {0, -Col}, but sometimes tmux sets it to
  971:         %% {-1, width(Text)} instead.
  972:         check_location(Term, [{0, -Col}, {-1, width(Text)}]),
  973: 
  974:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text) div 2 + Col]),
  975:         %% Depending on what happened with the cursor above, the line will be
  976:         %% different here.
  977:         check_location(Term, [{0, -Col + width(Text) div 2},
  978:                               {-1, -Col + width(Text) div 2}]),
  979:         ok
  980:     after
  981:         stop_tty(Term)
  982:     end.
  983: shell_small_window_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  984:     Term0 = start_tty(Config),
  985:     tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term0)," -x ",30, " -y ", 6]),
  986:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term0),
  987:     Term = Term0#tmux{orig_location = {Row, Col}},
  988:     Text = ("xbcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  989:         "abcdefghijkl\n"++
  990:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
  991:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklx"),
  992:     try
  993:         send_tty(Term,Text),
  994:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
  995:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  996:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  997:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  998:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  999:         send_tty(Term, "C-Down"),
 1000:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1001:         send_tty(Term, "Left"),
 1002:         check_location(Term, {-1, -4}),
 1003:         send_tty(Term, "Right"),
 1004:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1005:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4A"),
 1006:         check_location(Term, {-5, 0}),
 1007:         check_content(Term,"xbc"),
 1008:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4B"),
 1009:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
 1010:         check_content(Term,"klx"),
 1011:         send_tty(Term, " sets:is_e\t"),
 1012:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
 1013:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
 1014:         check_location(Term, {-3, 6}),
 1015:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
 1016:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
 1017:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
 1018:         send_tty(Term, "sets:is_e\t"),
 1019:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
 1020:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
 1021:         check_location(Term, {-4, 9}),
 1022:         send_tty(Term, "M-Enter"),
 1023:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1024:         ok
 1025:     after
 1026:         stop_tty(Term)
 1027:     end.
 1028: shell_huge_input(Config) ->
 1029:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1030: 
 1031:     ManyUnicode = lists:duplicate(100,hard_unicode()),
 1032: 
 1033:     try
 1034:         send_tty(Term,ManyUnicode),
 1035:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode_match(Config) ++ "$",
 1036:                       #{ replace => {"\n",""} }),
 1037:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1038:         ok
 1039:     after
 1040:         stop_tty(Term)
 1041:     end.
 1042: shell_receive_standard_out(Config) ->
 1043:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1044:     try
 1045:         send_tty(Term,"my_fun(5) -> ok; my_fun(N) -> receive after 100 -> io:format(\"~p\\n\", [N]), my_fun(N+1) end.\n"),
 1046:         send_tty(Term, "spawn(shell_default, my_fun, [0]). ABC\n"),
 1047:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1048:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that we are at the same location relative to the start.
 1049:         check_content(Term, "3\\s+4\\s+.+>\\sABC"),
 1050:         ok
 1051:     after
 1052:         stop_tty(Term)
 1053:     end.
 1054: %% Test that the shell works when invalid utf-8 (aka latin1) is sent to it
 1055: shell_invalid_unicode(Config) ->
 1056:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1057: 
 1058:     InvalidUnicode = <<$,$,$>>, %%  in latin1
 1059: 
 1060:     try
 1061:         send_tty(Term,hard_unicode()),
 1062:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode() ++ "$"),
 1063:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1064:         check_content(Term, "illegal character"),
 1065:         %% Send invalid utf-8
 1066:         send_stdin(Term,InvalidUnicode),
 1067:         %% Check that the utf-8 was echoed
 1068:         check_content(Term, "\\\\345\\\\344\\\\366$"),
 1069:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1070:         %% Check that the terminal entered "latin1" mode
 1071:         send_tty(Term,"."),
 1072:         check_content(Term, "\\Q\\360\\237\\230\\200\\355\\225\\234.\\E$"),
 1073:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1074:         %% Check that we can reset the encoding to unicode
 1075:         send_tty(Term,"io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."),
 1076:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1077:         check_content(Term, "\nok\n"),
 1078:         send_tty(Term,""),
 1079:         check_content(Term, "$"),
 1080:         ok
 1081:     after
 1082:         stop_tty(Term),
 1083:         ok
 1084:     end.
 1085: 
 1086: 
 1087: %% Test the we can handle ansi insert, navigation and delete
 1088: %%   We currently can not so skip this test
 1089: shell_support_ansi_input(Config) ->
 1090: 
 1091:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1092: 
 1093:     BoldText = "\e[;1m",
 1094:     ClearText = "\e[0m",
 1095: 
 1096:     try
 1097:         send_stdin(Term,["{",BoldText,"ab",ClearText,"}"]),
 1098:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1099:         try check_location(Term, {0, width("{1mabm}")}) of
 1100:             _ ->
 1101:                 throw({skip, "Do not support ansi input"})
 1102:         catch _:_ ->
 1103:                 ok
 1104:         end,
 1105:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{ab}")}),
 1106:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term,"-e") end,
 1107:                       ["{", BoldText, "ab", ClearText, "}"]),
 1108:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1109:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1110:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a")}),
 1111:         send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
 1112:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
 1113:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
 1114:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1115:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1116:         check_content(Term, ["{", BoldText, "a"]),
 1117:         ok
 1118:     after
 1119:         stop_tty(Term),
 1120:         ok
 1121:     end.
 1122: 
 1123: shell_expand_location_below(Config) ->
 1124: 
 1125:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1126: 
 1127:     {Rows, _} = get_window_size(Term),
 1128:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
 1129: 
 1130:     NumFunctions = lists:seq(0, Row*2),
 1131:     FunctionName = "a_long_function_name",
 1132: 
 1133:     Module = lists:flatten(
 1134:                ["-module(long_module).\n",
 1135:                 "-export([",lists:join($,,[io_lib:format("~s~p/0",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]),"]).\n\n",
 1136:                 [io_lib:format("~s~p() -> ok.\n",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]]),
 1137: 
 1138:     DoScan = fun F([]) ->
 1139:                      [];
 1140:                  F(Str) ->
 1141:                      {done,{ok,T,_},C} = erl_scan:tokens([],Str,0),
 1142:                      [ T | F(C) ]
 1143:              end,
 1144:     Forms = [ begin {ok,Y} = erl_parse:parse_form(X),Y end || X <- DoScan(Module) ],
 1145:     {ok,_,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms, [debug_info]),
 1146: 
 1147:     try
 1148:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1149:         Cols = 80,
 1150: 
 1151:         %% First check that basic completion works
 1152:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1153:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1154:         %% Cursor at correct place
 1155:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:")}),
 1156:         %% Nothing after the start( completion
 1157:         check_content(Term, "start\\($"),
 1158: 
 1159:         %% Check that completion is cleared when we type
 1160:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1161:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:s")}),
 1162:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1163: 
 1164:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a term
 1165:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1166:         send_tty(Term, "["),
 1167:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1168:         send_tty(Term, ", test_after]"),
 1169:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", test_after]"],
 1170:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1171:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("[escript:s")}),
 1172:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1173:         send_tty(Term, "C-K"),
 1174: 
 1175:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a long term
 1176:         send_tty(Term, ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"),
 1177:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"],
 1178:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1179:         check_location(Term, {-4, width("[escript:s")}),
 1180:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1181:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1182:         send_stdin(Term, ".\n"),
 1183: 
 1184:         %% Check that we behave as we should with very long completions
 1185:         rpc(Term, fun() ->
 1186:                           {module, long_module} = code:load_binary(long_module, "long_module.beam", Bin)
 1187:                   end),
 1188:         check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1189:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -y 50"]),
 1190:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1191:         Result = 61,
 1192:         Rows1 = 48,
 1193:         send_stdin(Term, "long_module:" ++ FunctionName),
 1194:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1195:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1196: 
 1197:         %% Check that correct text is printed below expansion
 1198:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1199:                                           [1, 7, Result])),
 1200:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1201:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1202:             [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1203:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1204:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1205:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1206:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1207:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1208:                                           [7, Rows1+6, Result])),
 1209:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1210:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1211:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1212:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1213:         %% Overshoot up
 1214:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1215:                                           [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1216:         %% Overshoot down
 1217:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1218:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1219:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1220:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1221:                                           [14, Rows1+13, Result])),
 1222:         check_content(Term, "\n.*a_long_function_name99\\("),
 1223:         send_tty(Term, "Up"),
 1224:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1225:                                           [13, Rows1+12, Result])),
 1226: 
 1227:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1228: 
 1229:         %% We resize the terminal to make everything fit and test that
 1230:         %% expand below displays everything
 1231:         tmux(["resize-window -t ", tty_name(Term), " -y ", integer_to_list(Row+10)]),
 1232:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1233:         send_tty(Term, "\t\t"),
 1234:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name99\\($"),
 1235: 
 1236:         %% Check that doing an expansion when cursor is in xnfix position works
 1237:         send_tty(Term, "BSpace"),
 1238:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:a_long_function_nam$"),
 1239:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1240:         send_tty(Term, lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(", long_module:a_long_function_name"), "a")),
 1241:         send_tty(Term, ", "),
 1242:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1243:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1244:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1245:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1246:         check_content(Term, "3> a+, long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\n\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1247:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1248:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1249:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1250:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1251:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1252: 
 1253:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1254:         send_tty(Term, lists:duplicate(Cols, "b")),
 1255:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1256:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1257:         check_content(Term, "3> b+\nb+a+, long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\n\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1258:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1259:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1260:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1261:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1262:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1263: 
 1264:         ok
 1265:     after
 1266:         stop_tty(Term),
 1267:         ok
 1268:     end.
 1269: 
 1270: shell_expand_location_above(Config) ->
 1271: 
 1272:     Term = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_expand_location","above"]}|Config]),
 1273: 
 1274:     try
 1275:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1276:         send_stdin(Term, "escript:"),
 1277:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1278:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:")}),
 1279:         check_content(Term, "start\\(\n"),
 1280:         check_content(Term, "escript:$"),
 1281:         send_stdin(Term, "s"),
 1282:         send_stdin(Term, "\t"),
 1283:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:s")}),
 1284:         check_content(Term, "\nscript_name\\([ ]+start\\(\n"),
 1285:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1286:         ok
 1287:     after
 1288:         stop_tty(Term),
 1289:         ok
 1290:     end.
 1291: 
 1292: shell_help(Config) ->
 1293:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1294:     try
 1295:         send_tty(Term, "application:put_env(kernel, shell_docs_ansi, false).\n"),
 1296:         send_tty(Term, "lists"),
 1297:         send_tty(Term, "\^[h"),
 1298:         %% Check we can see the first line
 1299:         check_content(Term, "List processing functions."),
 1300:         check_not_in_content(Term, "less than or equal to"),
 1301:         %% Expand the help area to take up the whole buffer.
 1302:         send_tty(Term, "\^[h"),
 1303:         %% Check that we can see the last line (lists help should fit in the window)
 1304:         check_content(Term, "less than or equal to"),
 1305:         send_tty(Term, ":all"),
 1306:         send_tty(Term, "\^[h"),
 1307:         check_content(Term, ~S"all\(Pred, List\)"),
 1308:         ok
 1309:     after
 1310:         stop_tty(Term),
 1311:         ok
 1312:     end.
 1313: %% Test the we can handle invalid ansi escape chars.
 1314: %%   tmux cannot handle this... so we test this using to_erl
 1315: shell_invalid_ansi(_Config) ->
 1316: 
 1317:     InvalidAnsiPrompt =
 1318:         case proplists:get_value(encoding, io:getopts(user)) of
 1319:             unicode ->
 1320:                 ["\e]94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e]0m"];
 1321:             latin1 ->
 1322:                 ["\e]94minvalid_test\e]0m"]
 1323:         end,
 1324: 
 1325:     rtnode:run(
 1326:       [{eval, fun() -> application:set_env(
 1327:                          stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1328:                          fun() -> InvalidAnsiPrompt end)
 1329:               end },
 1330:        {putline,"a."},
 1331:        {expect, "a[.]"},
 1332:        {expect, ["\\Q",InvalidAnsiPrompt,"\\E"]}],
 1333:       "", "",
 1334:       ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1335:        "-connect_all","false",
 1336:        "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1337:        "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1338:        "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1339:        "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1340:       ]).
 1341: 
 1342: shell_get_password(_Config) ->
 1343:    
 1344:     rtnode:run(
 1345:       [{putline,"io:get_password()."},
 1346:        {putline,"secret\r"},
 1347:        {expect, "\r\n\r\n\"secret\""}]),
 1348: 
 1349:     %% io:get_password only works when run in "newshell"
 1350:     rtnode:run(
 1351:       [{putline,"io:get_password()."},
 1352:        {expect, "\\Q{error,enotsup}\\E"}],
 1353:      "","",["-oldshell"]).
 1354: 
 1355: 
 1356: shell_ignore_pager_commands(Config) ->
 1357:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1358:     case code:get_doc(file, #{sources=>[eep48]}) of
 1359:         {error, _} -> {skip, "No documentation available"};
 1360:         _ ->
 1361:             try
 1362:                 send_tty(Term, "h(file).\n"),
 1363:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qmore (y/n)? (y)\\E"),
 1364:                 send_tty(Term, "n\n"),
 1365:                 check_content(Term,"ok"),
 1366:                 send_tty(Term, "C-P"),
 1367:                 check_content(Term,"\\Qh(file).\\E"),
 1368:                 ok
 1369:             after
 1370:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1371:                 ok
 1372:             end
 1373:     end.
 1374: test_valid_keymap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1375:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1376:     Term = setup_tty([{args, ["-config", DataDir ++ "valid_keymap.config"]} | Config]),
 1377:     Prompt = fun() -> ["\e[94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e[0m"] end,
 1378:     erpc:call(Term#tmux.node, application, set_env,
 1379:               [stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1380:                proplists:get_value(shell_prompt_func_test, Config, Prompt)]),
 1381:     try
 1382:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid key"),
 1383:         check_not_in_content(Term, "Invalid function"),
 1384:         send_tty(Term, "asdf"),
 1385:         send_tty(Term, "C-u"),
 1386:         check_content(Term, ">$"),
 1387:         send_tty(Term, "1.\n"),
 1388:         send_tty(Term, "C-b"),
 1389:         check_content(Term, "2>\\s1.$"),
 1390:         ok
 1391:     after
 1392:         stop_tty(Term),
 1393:         ok
 1394:     end.
 1395: 
 1396: test_invalid_keymap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1397:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir,Config),
 1398:     Term1 = setup_tty([{args, ["-config", DataDir ++ "invalid_keymap.config"]} | Config]),
 1399:     try
 1400:         check_content(Term1, "Invalid key"),
 1401:         check_content(Term1, "Invalid function"),
 1402:         send_tty(Term1, "asdf"),
 1403:         send_tty(Term1, "C-u"),
 1404:         check_content(Term1, ">$"),
 1405:         ok
 1406:     after
 1407:         stop_tty(Term1),
 1408:         ok
 1409:     end.
 1410: external_editor(Config) ->
 1411:     case os:find_executable("nano") of
 1412:         false -> {skip, "nano is not installed"};
 1413:         _ ->
 1414:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1415:             try
 1416:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1417:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1418:                 send_tty(Term, "\"some text with\nnewline in it\""),
 1419:                 check_content(Term,"3> \"some text with\\s*\n.+\\s*newline in it\""),
 1420:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"),
 1421:                 check_content(Term,"GNU nano [\\d.]+"),
 1422:                 check_content(Term,"\"some text with\\s*\n\\s*newline in it\""),
 1423:                 send_tty(Term, "Right"),
 1424:                 send_tty(Term, "still"),
 1425:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1426:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% save in nano
 1427:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1428:                 send_tty(Term, "C-X"), %% quit in nano
 1429:                 check_content(Term,"3> \"still\\s*\n\\s*.+\\s*some text with\\s*\n.+\\s*newline in it\""),
 1430:                 send_tty(Term,".\n"),
 1431:                 check_content(Term,"\\Q\"still\\nsome text with\\nnewline in it\"\\E"),
 1432:                 ok
 1433:             after
 1434:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1435:                 ok
 1436:             end
 1437:     end.
 1438: 
 1439: external_editor_visual(Config) ->
 1440:     case os:find_executable("vim") of
 1441:         false ->
 1442:             {skip, "vim is not installed"};
 1443:         _ ->
 1444:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1445:             try
 1446:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1447:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1448:                 check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1449:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"VISUAL\",\"vim -u DEFAULTS -U NONE -i NONE\").\n"),
 1450:                 check_content(Term, "4>"),
 1451:                 send_tty(Term,"\"hello"),
 1452:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% Open vim
 1453:                 check_content(Term, "^\"hello"),
 1454:                 send_tty(Term, "$"), %% Set cursor at end
 1455:                 send_tty(Term, "a"), %% Enter insert mode at end
 1456:                 check_content(Term, "-- INSERT --"),
 1457:                 send_tty(Term, "\"."),
 1458:                 send_tty(Term,"Escape"),
 1459:                 send_tty(Term,":wq"),
 1460:                 send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1461:                 check_content(Term, "\"hello\"[.]$"),
 1462:                 send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1463:                 check_content(Term, "\"hello\""),
 1464:                 check_content(Term, "5>$")
 1465:             after
 1466:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1467:                 ok
 1468:             end
 1469:     end.
 1470: 
 1471: external_editor_unicode(Config) ->
 1472:     NanoPath = os:find_executable("nano"),
 1473:     case NanoPath of
 1474:         false -> {skip, "nano is not installed"};
 1475:         _ ->
 1476:             Term = start_tty(Config),
 1477:             try
 1478:                 tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1479:                 send_tty(Term,"os:putenv(\"EDITOR\",\"nano\").\n"),
 1480:                 send_tty(Term, hard_unicode()),
 1481:                 check_content(Term,"3> " ++ hard_unicode_match(Config)),
 1482:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% open external editor (nano)
 1483:                 check_content(Term,"GNU nano [\\d.]+"),
 1484:                 send_tty(Term, "still "),
 1485:                 check_content(Term,"\nstill "),
 1486:                 send_tty(Term, "C-O"), %% save in nano
 1487:                 send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1488:                 send_tty(Term, "C-X"), %% quit in nano
 1489:                 check_content(Term,"still "++hard_unicode_match(Config)),
 1490:                 ok
 1491:             after
 1492:                 stop_tty(Term),
 1493:                 ok
 1494:             end
 1495:     end.
 1496: 
 1497: %% There used to be a race condition when using shell:start_interactive where
 1498: %% the newline handling of standard_error did not change correctly to compensate
 1499: %% for the tty changing to canonical mode
 1500: shell_standard_error_nlcr(Config) ->
 1501: 
 1502:     [
 1503:      begin
 1504:          Term = setup_tty([{env,[{"TERM",TERM}]},{args, ["-noshell"]} | Config]),
 1505:          try
 1506:              rpc(Term, io, format, [standard_error,"test~ntest~ntest", []]),
 1507:              check_content(Term, "test\ntest\ntest$"),
 1508:              rpc(Term, fun() -> shell:start_interactive(),
 1509:                                 io:format(standard_error,"test~ntest~ntest", [])
 1510:                        end),
 1511:              check_content(Term, "test\ntest\ntest(\n|.)*test\ntest\ntest")
 1512:          after
 1513:              stop_tty(Term)
 1514:          end
 1515:      end || TERM <- ["dumb",os:getenv("TERM")]].
 1516: 
 1517: %% We test that suspending of `erl` and then resuming restores the shell
 1518: shell_suspend(Config) ->
 1519: 
 1520:     Name = peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path,Config)),
 1521:     %% In order to suspend `erl` we need it to run in a shell that has job control
 1522:     %% so we start the peer within a tmux window instead of having it be the original
 1523:     %% process.
 1524:     os:cmd("tmux new-window -n " ++ Name ++ " -d -- bash --norc"),
 1525: 
 1526:     Peer = #{ name => Name,
 1527:               post_process_args =>
 1528:                         fun(["new-window","-n",_,"-d","--"|CmdAndArgs]) ->
 1529:                                 FlatCmdAndArgs =
 1530:                                       lists:join(
 1531:                                         " ",[[$',A,$'] || A <- CmdAndArgs]),
 1532:                                 ["send","-t",Name,lists:flatten(FlatCmdAndArgs),"Enter"]
 1533:                         end
 1534:             },
 1535: 
 1536: 
 1537:     Term = start_tty([{peer, Peer}|Config]),
 1538: 
 1539:     try
 1540:         send_tty(Term, hard_unicode()),
 1541:         check_content(Term,["2> ",hard_unicode(),"$"]),
 1542:         send_tty(Term, "C-Z"),
 1543:         check_content(Term,"\\Q[1]+\\E\\s*Stopped"),
 1544:         send_tty(Term, "fg"),
 1545:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1546:         send_tty(Term, "M-l"),
 1547:         check_content(Term,["2> ",hard_unicode(),"$"]),
 1548:         check_location(Term,{0,width(hard_unicode())}),
 1549:         ok
 1550:     after
 1551:         stop_tty(Term),
 1552:         ok
 1553:     end.
 1554: 
 1555: %% We test that suspending of `erl` and then resuming restores the shell
 1556: shell_full_queue(Config) ->
 1557: 
 1558:     [throw({skip,"Need unbuffered to run"}) || os:find_executable("unbuffered") =:= false],
 1559: 
 1560:     %% In order to fill the read buffer of the terminal we need to get a
 1561:     %% bit creative. We first need to start erl in bash in order to be
 1562:     %% able to get access to job control for suspended processes.
 1563:     %% We then also wrap `erl` in `unbuffer -p` so that we can suspend
 1564:     %% that program in order to block writing to stdout for a while.
 1565: 
 1566:     Name = peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path,Config)),
 1567:     os:cmd("tmux new-window -n " ++ Name ++ " -d -- bash --norc"),
 1568: 
 1569:     Peer = #{ name => Name,
 1570:               post_process_args =>
 1571:                         fun(["new-window","-n",_,"-d","--"|CmdAndArgs]) ->
 1572:                                 FlatCmdAndArgs = ["unbuffer -p "] ++
 1573:                                       lists:join(
 1574:                                         " ",[[$',A,$'] || A <- CmdAndArgs]),
 1575:                                 ["send","-t",Name,lists:flatten(FlatCmdAndArgs),"Enter"]
 1576:                         end
 1577:             },
 1578: 
 1579: 
 1580:     Term = start_tty([{peer, Peer}|Config]),
 1581: 
 1582:     UnbufferedPid = os:cmd("ps -o ppid= -p " ++ rpc(Term,os,getpid,[])),
 1583: 
 1584:     WriteUntilStopped =
 1585:         fun F(Char) ->
 1586:                 rpc(Term,io,format,[user,[Char],[]]),
 1587:                 put(bytes,get(bytes,0)+1),
 1588:                 receive
 1589:                     stop ->
 1590:                         rpc(Term,io,format,[user,[Char+1],[]])
 1591:                 after 0 -> F(Char)
 1592:                 end
 1593:         end,
 1594: 
 1595:     WaitUntilBlocked =
 1596:         fun(Pid, Ref) ->
 1597:                 (fun F(Cnt) ->
 1598:                          receive
 1599:                              {'DOWN',Ref,_,_,_} = Down ->
 1600:                                  ct:fail({io_format_did_not_block, Down})
 1601:                          after 1000 ->
 1602:                                  ok
 1603:                          end,
 1604:                          case process_info(Pid,dictionary) of
 1605:                              {dictionary,[{bytes,Cnt}]} ->
 1606:                                  ct:log("Bytes until blocked: ~p~n",[Cnt]),
 1607:                                  %% Add one extra byte as for
 1608:                                  %% the current blocking call
 1609:                                  Cnt + 1;
 1610:                              {dictionary,[{bytes,NewCnt}]} ->
 1611:                                  F(NewCnt)
 1612:                          end
 1613:                  end)(0)
 1614:         end,
 1615: 
 1616:     try
 1617:         %% First test that we can suspend and then resume
 1618:         os:cmd("kill -TSTP " ++ UnbufferedPid),
 1619:         check_content(Term,"\\Q[1]+\\E\\s*Stopped"),
 1620:         {Pid, Ref} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> WriteUntilStopped($a) end),
 1621:         WaitUntilBlocked(Pid, Ref),
 1622:         send_tty(Term, "fg"),
 1623:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1624:         Pid ! stop,
 1625:         check_content(Term,"b$"),
 1626: 
 1627:         send_tty(Term, "."),
 1628:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1629: 
 1630:         %% Then we test that all characters are written when system
 1631:         %% is terminated just after writing
 1632:         {ok,Cols} = rpc(Term,io,columns,[user]),
 1633:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1634:         os:cmd("kill -TSTP " ++ UnbufferedPid),
 1635:         check_content(Term,"\\Q[1]+\\E\\s*Stopped"),
 1636:         {Pid2, Ref2} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> WriteUntilStopped($c) end),
 1637:         Bytes = WaitUntilBlocked(Pid2, Ref2) - 1,
 1638:         stop_tty(Term),
 1639:         send_tty(Term, "fg"),
 1640:         send_tty(Term, "Enter"),
 1641:         check_content(
 1642:           fun() ->
 1643:                   tmux(["capture-pane -p -S - -E - -t ",tty_name(Term)])
 1644:           end, lists:flatten([lists:duplicate(Cols,$c) ++ "\n" ||
 1645:                                  _ <- lists:seq(1,(Bytes) div Cols)]
 1646:                              ++ [lists:duplicate((Bytes) rem Cols,$c)])),
 1647:         ct:log("~ts",[tmux(["capture-pane -p -S - -E - -t ",tty_name(Term)])]),
 1648:         ok
 1649:     after
 1650:         stop_tty(Term),
 1651:         ok
 1652:     end.
 1653: 
 1654: get(Key,Default) ->
 1655:     case get(Key) of
 1656:         undefined ->
 1657:             Default;
 1658:         Value ->
 1659:             Value
 1660:     end.
 1661: 
 1662: %% A list of unicode graphemes that are notoriously hard to render
 1663: hard_unicode() ->
 1664:     ZWJ =
 1665:         case os:type() of
 1666:             %% macOS has very good rendering of ZWJ,
 1667:             %% but the cursor does not agree with it..
 1668:             {unix, darwin} -> [];
 1669:             _ -> [[16#1F91A,16#1F3FC]]    % Hand with skintone 
 1670:         end,
 1671:     [[16#1f600],             % Smilie 
 1672:     "",                   % Hangul
 1673:     "Z","a","l","g","o" %% Vertically stacked chars
 1674:      %%"",            % Zero width joiner
 1675:      %%""                % Zero width joiner
 1676:      | ZWJ].
 1677: 
 1678: hard_unicode_match(Config) ->
 1679:     ["\\Q",[unicode_to_octet(Config, U) || U <- hard_unicode()],"\\E"].
 1680: 
 1681: unicode_to_octet(Config, U) ->
 1682:     case ?config(encoding,Config) of
 1683:         unicode -> U;
 1684:         latin1 -> unicode_to_octet(U)
 1685:     end.
 1686: 
 1687: unicode_to_octet(U) ->
 1688:     [if Byte >= 128 -> [$\\,integer_to_list(Byte,8)];
 1689:         true -> Byte
 1690:      end || <<Byte>> <= unicode:characters_to_binary(U)].
 1691: 
 1692: unicode_to_hex(Config, U) ->
 1693:     case ?config(encoding,Config) of
 1694:         unicode -> U;
 1695:         latin1 -> unicode_to_hex(U)
 1696:     end.
 1697: 
 1698: unicode_to_hex(U) when is_integer(U) ->
 1699:     unicode_to_hex([U]);
 1700: unicode_to_hex(Us) ->
 1701:     [if U < 128 -> U;
 1702:         U < 512 -> ["\\",integer_to_list(U,8)];
 1703:         true -> ["\\x{",integer_to_list(U,16),"}"]
 1704:      end || U <- Us].
 1705: 
 1706: width(C, Str) ->
 1707:     case ?config(encoding, C) of
 1708:         unicode -> width(Str);
 1709:         latin1 -> width(unicode_to_octet(Str))
 1710:     end.
 1711: width(Str) ->
 1712:     lists:sum(
 1713:       [npwcwidth(CP) || CP <- lists:flatten(Str)]).
 1714: 
 1715: npwcwidth(CP) ->
 1716:     try prim_tty:npwcwidth(CP)
 1717:     catch error:undef ->
 1718:             if CP =:= 16#D55C ->
 1719:                     2; %% 
 1720:                CP =:= 16#1f91A ->
 1721:                     2; %% hand
 1722:                CP =:= 16#1F3Fc ->
 1723:                     2; %% Skintone
 1724:                CP =:= 16#1f600 ->
 1725:                     2; %% smilie
 1726:                true ->
 1727:                     case lists:member(CP, [775,776,780,785,786,787,788,791,793,794,
 1728:                                            804,813,848,852,854,858,871,875,878]) of
 1729:                         true ->
 1730:                             0;
 1731:                         false ->
 1732:                             1
 1733:                     end
 1734:             end
 1735:     end.
 1736: 
 1737: tmux([Cmd|_] = Command) when is_list(Cmd) ->
 1738:     tmux(lists:concat(Command));
 1739: tmux(Command) ->
 1740:     string:trim(os:cmd(["tmux ",Command])).
 1741: 
 1742: rpc(#tmux{ node = N }, Fun) ->
 1743:     erpc:call(N, Fun).
 1744: rpc(#tmux{ node = N }, M, F, A) ->
 1745:     erpc:call(N, M, F, A).
 1746: 
 1747: %% Setup a TTY, but do not type anything in terminal
 1748: setup_tty(Config) ->
 1749:     Name = maps:get(name,proplists:get_value(peer, Config, #{}),
 1750:                     peer:random_name(proplists:get_value(tc_path, Config))),
 1751: 
 1752:     Envs = lists:flatmap(fun({Key,Value}) ->
 1753:                                  ["-env",Key,Value]
 1754:                          end, proplists:get_value(env,Config,[])),
 1755: 
 1756:     ExtraArgs = proplists:get_value(args,Config,[]),
 1757: 
 1758:     ExecArgs = case os:getenv("TMUX_DEBUG") of
 1759:                    "strace" ->
 1760:                        STraceLog = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),
 1761:                                                  Name++".strace"),
 1762:                        ct:log("Link to strace: file://~ts", [STraceLog]),
 1763:                        [os:find_executable("strace"),"-f",
 1764:                         "-o",STraceLog,
 1765:                         "-e","trace=all",
 1766:                         "-e","read=0,1,2",
 1767:                         "-e","write=0,1,2"
 1768:                        ] ++ string:split(ct:get_progname()," ",all);
 1769:                    "rr" ->
 1770:                        [os:find_executable("cerl"),"-rr"];
 1771:                    _ ->
 1772:                        string:split(ct:get_progname()," ",all)
 1773:                end,
 1774:     DefaultPeerArgs = #{ name => Name,
 1775:                          exec =>
 1776:                              {os:find_executable("tmux"),
 1777:                               ["new-window","-n",Name,"-d","--"] ++ ExecArgs },
 1778: 
 1779:                          args => ["-pz",filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 1780:                                   "-connect_all","false",
 1781: %                                  "-kernel","logger_level","all",
 1782:                                   "-kernel","shell_history","disabled",
 1783:                                   "-kernel","prevent_overlapping_partitions","false",
 1784:                                   "-eval","shell:prompt_func({interactive_shell_SUITE,prompt})."
 1785:                                  ] ++ Envs ++ ExtraArgs,
 1786:                          wait_boot => 60_000,
 1787:                          detached => false
 1788:                        },
 1789: 
 1790:     {ok, Peer, Node} =
 1791:         ?CT_PEER(maps:merge(proplists:get_value(peer,Config,#{}),
 1792:                             DefaultPeerArgs)),
 1793: 
 1794:     Self = self(),
 1795: 
 1796:     %% By default peer links with the starter. For these TCs we however only
 1797:     %% want the peer to die if we die, so we create a "unidirection link" using
 1798:     %% monitors.
 1799:     spawn(fun() ->
 1800:                   TCRef = erlang:monitor(process, Self),
 1801:                   PeerRef = erlang:monitor(process, Peer),
 1802:                   receive
 1803:                       {'DOWN',TCRef,_,_,Reason} ->
 1804:                           exit(Peer, Reason);
 1805:                       {'DOWN',PeerRef,_,_,_} ->
 1806:                           ok
 1807:                   end
 1808:           end),
 1809:     unlink(Peer),
 1810: 
 1811:     "" = tmux(["set-option -t ",Name," remain-on-exit on"]),
 1812: 
 1813:     %% We start tracing on the remote node in order to help debugging
 1814:     TraceLog = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config),Name++".trace"),
 1815:     ct:log("Link to trace: file://~ts",[TraceLog]),
 1816: 
 1817:     spawn(Node,
 1818:           fun() ->
 1819:                   {ok, _} = dbg:tracer(file,TraceLog),
 1820:                   %% dbg:p(whereis(user_drv),[c,m]),
 1821:                   %% dbg:p(whereis(user_drv_writer),[c,m]),
 1822:                   %% dbg:p(whereis(user_drv_reader),[c,m]),
 1823:                   %% dbg:tp(user_drv,x),
 1824:                   %% dbg:tp(prim_tty,x),
 1825:                   %% dbg:tpl(prim_tty,write_nif,x),
 1826:                   %% dbg:tpl(prim_tty,read_nif,x),
 1827:                   monitor(process, Self),
 1828:                   receive _ -> ok end
 1829:           end),
 1830: 
 1831:     #tmux{ peer = Peer, node = Node, name = Name }.
 1832: 
 1833: %% Start a tty, setup custom prompt and set cursor at bottom
 1834: start_tty(Config) ->
 1835: 
 1836:     Term = setup_tty(Config),
 1837: 
 1838:     Prompt = fun() -> ["\e[94m",54620,44397,50612,47,51312,49440,47568,"\e[0m"] end,
 1839:     erpc:call(Term#tmux.node, application, set_env,
 1840:               [stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1841:                proplists:get_value(shell_prompt_func_test, Config, Prompt)]),
 1842: 
 1843:     {Rows, _} = get_window_size(Term),
 1844: 
 1845:     %% We send a lot of newlines here in order for the number of rows
 1846:     %% in the window to be max so that we can predict what the cursor
 1847:     %% position is.
 1848:     [send_tty(Term,"\n") || _ <- lists:seq(1, Rows)],
 1849: 
 1850:     %% We enter an 'a' here so that we can get the correct orig position
 1851:     %% with an alternative prompt.
 1852:     send_tty(Term,"a.\n"),
 1853:     check_content(Term,"2>$"),
 1854:     OrigLocation = get_location(Term),
 1855:     Term#tmux{ orig_location = OrigLocation }.
 1856: 
 1857: prompt(L) ->
 1858:     N = proplists:get_value(history, L, 0),
 1859:     Fun = application:get_env(stdlib, shell_prompt_func_test,
 1860:                               fun() -> atom_to_list(node()) end),
 1861:     io_lib:format("(~ts)~w> ",[Fun(),N]).
 1862: 
 1863: stop_tty(Term) ->
 1864:     catch peer:stop(Term#tmux.peer),
 1865:     ct:log("~ts",[get_content(Term, "-e")]),
 1866: %    "" = tmux("kill-window -t " ++ Term#tmux.name),
 1867:     ok.
 1868: 
 1869: tty_name(Term) ->
 1870:     Term#tmux.name.
 1871: 
 1872: send_tty(Term, "Home") ->
 1873:     %% https://stackoverflow.com/a/55616731
 1874:     send_tty(Term,"Escape"),
 1875:     send_tty(Term,"OH");
 1876: send_tty(Term, "End") ->
 1877:     send_tty(Term,"Escape"),
 1878:     send_tty(Term,"OF");
 1879: send_tty(#tmux{ name = Name } = _Term,Value) ->
 1880:     [Head | Quotes] = string:split(Value, "'", all),
 1881:     "" = tmux("send -t " ++ Name ++ " '" ++ Head ++ "'"),
 1882:     [begin
 1883:          "" = tmux("send -t " ++ Name ++ " \"'\""),
 1884:          "" = tmux("send -t " ++ Name ++ " '" ++ V ++ "'")
 1885:      end || V <- Quotes].
 1886: 
 1887: %% We use send_stdin for testing of things that we cannot sent via
 1888: %% the tmux send command, such as invalid unicode
 1889: send_stdin(Term, Chars) when is_binary(Chars) ->
 1890:     rpc(Term,erlang,display_string,[stdin,Chars]);
 1891: send_stdin(Term, Chars) ->
 1892:     send_stdin(Term, iolist_to_binary(unicode:characters_to_binary(Chars))).
 1893: 
 1894: check_location(Term, Where) ->
 1895:     check_location(Term, Where, 5).
 1896: check_location(Term, Where, Attempt) when is_tuple(Where) ->
 1897:     check_location(Term, [Where], Attempt);
 1898: check_location(#tmux{ orig_location = {OrigRow, OrigCol} = Orig } = Term,
 1899:                Where, Attempt) ->
 1900:     NewLocation = get_location(Term),
 1901:     case lists:any(fun({AdjRow, AdjCol}) ->
 1902:                            {OrigRow+AdjRow,OrigCol+AdjCol} =:= NewLocation
 1903:                    end, Where) of
 1904:         true -> NewLocation;
 1905:         false when Attempt =:= 0 ->
 1906:             {NewRow, NewCol} = NewLocation,
 1907:             ct:fail({wrong_location, {expected,Where},
 1908:                      {got,{NewRow - OrigRow, NewCol - OrigCol},
 1909:                       {NewLocation, Orig}}});
 1910:         false ->
 1911:             timer:sleep(50),
 1912:             check_location(Term, Where, Attempt -1)
 1913:     end.
 1914:
